desc.p: Indicates the type of access applicable for categories defined in associated category range defined in CATEGORY.FRM and CATEGORY.TO
Valid values
See, Transact
Starting range of Category for which the accounts belonging to the customer has the access as defined in associated CATEG.RANGE.SEL
Should be any valid CATEGORY record
End range of Category for which the accounts belonging to the customer has the access as defined in associated CATEG.RANGE.SEL
Should be any valid CATEGORY record
Description of access permissions of the record held in CHANNEL.PRODUCT.ACCESS
Standard Language field
Identifies the relationship of the Related customer for which the access specified in JOINT.TYPE.SELECT should be applicable.
Should be a valid record in RELATION application
Indicates the type of access applicable for relationship defined in associated JOINT.RELATION.
Valid values
See, Transact
The ID of a MANAGED.ACCOUNT record to be provided in this field to allow the user to access the portfolio that belong to this managed account.
Example:
If the value is '1', then all the SEC.ACC.MASTER records that has the MANAGED.ACCOUNT set to '1' will be accesible by the user.
This filed will be a NOINPUT field if SC is not installed.
Indicates the type of permission applicable managed accounts defined in associated PORT.MAN.ACCT field
Valid values
See, Transact, Exclude
Product Groups for which the access defined in PRODUCT.GRP.SEL is applicable
Should be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT.GROUP
Indicates the type of access applicable for groups defined in associated PRODUCT.GRP field
Valid values
See, Transact
Product for which the access defined in PRODUCT.SEL is applicable
Should be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT.
Indicates the type of access applicable for products defined in associated PRODUCT field
Valid values
See, Transact
